snippet.title: Millennia - Official Pre-Purchase Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-Purchase now on Steam: https://pdxint.at/MillenniaStore

Create your own nation in Millennia, a historical turn-based 4X game that challenges your strategic prowess across 10,000 years of history, from the dawn of humanity to our possible futures.

#millennia #strategygame #paradoxinteractive 
---------------------------------
Follow us on social media for Millennia News, Announcements and other fun stuff!

Twitter - https://pdxint.at/MillenniaTwitter
Facebook - https://pdxint.at/MillenniaFB
Discord - https://pdxint.at/MillenniaDiscord
Forum - https://pdxint.at/MillenniaForum
Steam - https://pdxint.at/MillenniaSteamCommunity
CivFanatics - https://pdxint.at/MillenniaCivFanatics
